title: Learn Their Communication Style
oneLiner: Match directness or subtlety to the culture.
detail: High-context cultures (Japan, France) expect context and nuance; low-context (USA, Germany) value clarity and brevity.

title: Pace & Tone Matter
oneLiner: Some move fast, others are deliberate—match the rhythm.
detail: Fast-paced cultures appreciate concise updates; deliberative cultures prefer time to process.

title: Mind Time Zones & Holidays
oneLiner: Prevent 3 AM calls and festival clashes.
detail: Check local time and public holidays before scheduling.

title: Be Careful with Humor & Idioms
detail: Idioms and sports metaphors may not translate.

title: Build Relationships First
detail: In many regions, rapport is essential. Start with small talk.

title: Watch Non‑Verbal Signals
oneLiner: Eye contact, silence, and space vary globally.
detail: Observe before you assume; mirror comfort level.

title: Confirm Understanding
oneLiner: Ask for a recap, not just a yes.
detail: Invite partners to summarize next steps.

title: Respect Hierarchy & Process
oneLiner: Some decisions are top‑down or consensus‑driven.

title: Adapt Feedback Style
detail: Germany/Netherlands value blunt clarity; Japan/India prefer softened critique.
